data.title: Visit Novato
data.text:
Shopping

Whether you find yourself with a leisurely few hours to spare or an entire day to indulge in exploration, Novato offers great shopping with a diverse array of boutiques, stores, and markets that cater to a variety of preferences.

Shopping in Novato

Craft Beer

Novato has become Marin’s go-to destination for serious beer enthusiasts, and a great place to get a taste of the craft beer world for the merely curious.

Craft Beer in Novato

World Class Hiking

Novato offers some of Marin County's best hiking trails amidst surrounding hills, marshlands, and valleys, providing immersive experiences with peaceful woodlands, bird and wildlife viewing, and breathtaking panoramic vistas.

Explore Hiking in Novato

Food and Drink

Indulge in Novato's diverse culinary scene featuring a wide selection of restaurants, bars, and cafes, where craft beer enthusiasts and those with varied tastes can savor menus designed to please a variety of palates.

What to Eat & Drink in Novato

Pampering

If you’re craving a little “me” time and want to rejuvenate your body and indulge your senses, Novato is home to some of the best Bay Area spas.

Pampering in Novato

Novato is perfectly placed for exploring the best of Wine Country. We're also home to a number of fantastic wineries and tasting rooms.

Explore wineries in Novato
